name: Gender Reveal Party
description:
Gender Reveal Party is...

a wildly good time!

a depressing meditation on our messed up healthcare system!

a game about the trans experience of one (1) person, who happens to be me. It is a digital humanities project that brings together the sociological field of autoethnography and video games. It's more fun that it sounds, I hope!

Gender Reveal Party is also.... not quite done yet! 

If you want to see prior game files, read my white paper, or see the books consulted in the making of this game, please visit my OSF page!

DOI: https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/HVNMT
